channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A guide to choosing the right Apple Watch
item.description: The gap between Apple's standard and budget smart watches has never felt smaller.

item.title: 4 Best Smart Scales (2026), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: If you’re ready to start tracking your weight, BMI, and other health data on your phone, we’ve weighed in on some great options.

item.title: European banks plan to cut 200,000 jobs as AI takes hold
item.description: The bloodletting will hit hardest in back-office operations, risk management, and compliance.
